His friends helped him out a little, but once he got to college everything got harder. Mr. Leonard had problems with reading, just like Paul. Paul is deeply moved because he can relate with Mr. Leonard about not being able to read. Paul wants to help him learn how to read since he is being taught at the learning center himself.
